page.title: 18Occupations in the area
page.content: A study of occupations in Old Warden and Ickwell villages enabled us to interveiw 80 local residents.From these statistics we established that the most common jobs were those concerned with the land.A number of engineers were found,the remaining jobs covering a wide selection.An interesting statistic was the number of retired people found in both villages.Ickwell it was found,offered little opportunity of work,but in Old Warden the Shuttleworth Estate,Pub, Post Office,the Whitbread Estate and surrounding farms offered better job prospects.Listed below are some of the statistics. Farmworkers 3.Engineers 4.Retired 23. Unemployed 2. Other jobs included cleaners,laserworkers,office workers, vets,tool fitters,child minders, nurses,judges,teachers and many others
